item.title: Didn't Tommy Douglas support eugenics?
item.description: While he wrote a paper supporting eugenics in his school years, he quickliy renounced the idea after seeing it implemented in Germany. Once premier, he rejected pressure to implement an eugenics program despite other provinces doing so and instead created programs to help those he once called subnormal.
